Test Name: Human Herpesvirus-6 (HHV-6) A and B DNA Detection and Quantification, PCR
Purpose: To detect and quantify Human Herpesvirus-6 types A and B DNA in plasma specimens using real-time PCR.
Equipment: Real-Time PCR instrument (e.g., ABI 7500 or CFX96), PCR workstation, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, calibrated pipettes with filter tips
